Layer.Launch1Command:
%function(self) local a = self if a then
b = a:GetChild('')
a:finishtweening() a:hidden(0)
b:x(sw/2) b:zoom(1.4) b:blend('add') b:y(-100)
if not slumpo then b:diffusealpha(.8) else b:diffusealpha(1) end
b:linear(.3) b:y(sh*1.5)
a:sleep(.5) a:queuecommand('Hide')
--Trace('haha1')
end end

Layer.Launch2Command:
%function(self) local a = self if a then
b = a:GetChild('')
a:finishtweening() a:hidden(0)
b:x(sw/2) b:zoom(1.4) b:blend('add') b:y(-100)
if not slumpo then b:diffusealpha(.8) else b:diffusealpha(1) end
b:linear(.3) b:y(sh*1.5)
a:sleep(.5) a:queuecommand('Hide')
--Trace('haha2')
end end
